content: अनुबंध्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Principal, chief, primary (which may receive an adjunct, as a root, a disease &c.). {@--2@} [वधार्थं बंधः अनुबंधः कर्मणि ण्यत्] To be killed (as a bull), one of the three principal sacrificial animals at the ज्योतिष्टोम sacrifice; गौरनुबंध्यः <ls>K. P. 2.</ls>
